ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) can Pillsbury® refrigerated crescent dinner rolls or Pillsbury® Crescent Recipe Creations™ refrigerated flaky dough sheet
2 ½ slices American cheese slices, quartered
10 frankfurter (5 in long x 3/4 in dia, 10 per pound)s large hot dogs

cookingTips: Cut crescent dough into thin strips for authentic mummy wrapping effect
Leave small gaps between dough strips for visual appeal
Use cheese pieces as eyes for fun Halloween presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help create a fun, playful dish by wrapping hot dogs in crescent dough strips to look like mummies, perfect for themed parties.
